other_tests.findings: 430 leukocytes (96% lymphocytes) per cubic millimeter, a protein level of 133 mg per deciliter, and a glucose level of 43 mg per deciliter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mild improvement in the lymphocytic pleocytosis was noted in subsequent lumbar punctures.

other_tests.findings: Powassan virus was identified in cerebrospinal fluid.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial rapid sequencing run completed on hospital day 11 confirmed Powassan virus, with no other plausible pathogens detected.

other_tests.findings: Continuous diffuse irregular delta waves, slowing of the background, and occasional right frontal broad sharp wave discharges, without seizures.
Diffuse lymphoid infiltrates; no evidence of vasculitis, infarction, or infection by spirochetes and common viral pathogens.
